amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Operation of the National Park System account by $2,500,000, and decreases funding for the Departmental Operations Office of the Secretary account for the Department of Interior by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Cicilline.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
